import React from 'react' import { Button, Card, Image, Icon, Header, Menu } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import moment from 'moment'; import './../scrollableContainer.css'; export default (props) => { console.log(props,'props for users') if (props.users.length === 0) { return
} else { return props.users.map(({ _id, badge, myStocks, firstName, lastName, strength, weakness, bio, email, dateCreated }) => { return ( {email} CodeFriender since: {dateCreated} {email} ) }) } }; {this.props.currentUser.email} CodeFriender since: {dateCreated} {email}
